title: progress
content:
# progress

2021-05-09 18:43

Progress bar.

Scan QR code to try:

![progress](https://marmot-local-dev.oss-ap-southeast-1.aliyuncs.com/storage/2020/1/10/ec81133a-f9e7-444b-b651-6bc8a5138a2d.png#align=left&display=inline&height=196&margin=%5Bobject%20Object%5D&originHeight=196&originWidth=196&status=done&style=none&width=196)

|     |     |     |     |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| **Property** | **Type** | **Default** | **Description** |
| percent | Float |  | Percentage (0~100). |
| show-info | Boolean | false | Show percentage value at right side. |
| stroke-width | Number | 6 | Line weight, in px. |
| active-color | Color | #09BB07 | Selected progress bar color. |
| background-color | Color |  | Unselected progress bar color. |
| active | Boolean | false | Loading animation from left to right or not. |

### Screenshot

![progress](https://marmot-local-dev.oss-ap-southeast-1.aliyuncs.com/storage/2020/1/14/16181c11-1ba9-444e-81b9-4c5c602031ec.png#align=left&display=inline&height=499&margin=%5Bobject%20Object%5D&originHeight=499&originWidth=750&status=done&style=stroke&width=750)

### Sample Code

copy

```html
<progress percent="20" show-info/>
<progress percent="40" active/>
<progress percent="60" stroke-width="10"/>
<progress percent="80" active/>
<progress percent="80" color="#10AEFF"/>
```
